author: https://github.com/FlokiTV
description:
Create virtual joystick for touch 

Screne Variables for joystick - JOY is name of your joystick

JOY_ANGLE - Angle of analog
JOY_PRESS - Numbler of directions (1 or 2 for diagonals)
JOY_DIR - Direction of joystick string
JOY_DIS - Distance of joystick from center
JOY_T - Return if is on TOP - Boolean
JOY_D - Return if is on DOWN - Boolean
JOY_R - Return if is on RIGHT - Boolean
JOY_L - Return if is on LEFT - Boolean
name: Nipple
shortDescription: A virtual joystick for touch capable interfaces

eventsFunctions.name: add
eventsFunctions.sentence: Add nipple _PARAM1_ size _PARAM6_ on position X _PARAM2_ and Y _PARAM3_ - Width: _PARAM4_ Height _PARAM5_ Background _PARAM8_ Type _PARAM7_; Debug _PARAM9_

parameters.description: X position (use px or % - this is a css position)
parameters.name: X

parameters.description: Y position  (use px or % - this is a css position)
parameters.name: Y

parameters.description: Container Width (use px or % - this is a css size)
parameters.name: W

parameters.description: Container Height (use px or % - this is a css size)
parameters.name: H

events.inlineCode:
let APP_NAME = eventsFunctionContext.getArgument("Name")
let POSITION = eventsFunctionContext.getArgument("Position")
let EL = document.querySelector(`#_joystick_${APP_NAME}`)
// document.querySelector(`#_joystick_${APP_NAME}`).style.display = "block"
switch(POSITION){
    case "Top left":
        EL.style.top = 0
        EL.style.left = 0
    break
    case "Top center":
        EL.style.top = 0
        EL.style.left = "calc(50% - "+EL.offsetWidth/2+"px)"
    break
    case "Top right":
        EL.style.top = 0
        EL.style.left = "calc(100% - "+EL.offsetWidth+"px)"
    break
    case "Center left":
        EL.style.top = "calc(50% - "+EL.offsetHeight/2+"px)"
        EL.style.left = 0
    break
    case "Center center":
        EL.style.top = "calc(50% - "+EL.offsetHeight/2+"px)"
        EL.style.left = "calc(50% - "+EL.offsetWidth/2+"px)"
    break
    case "Center right":
        EL.style.top = "calc(50% - "+EL.offsetHeight/2+"px)"
        EL.style.left = "calc(100% - "+EL.offsetWidth+"px)"
    break
    case "Bottom left":
        EL.style.top = "calc(100% - "+EL.offsetHeight+"px)"
        EL.style.left = 0
    break
    case "Bottom center":
        EL.style.top = "calc(100% - "+EL.offsetHeight+"px)"
        EL.style.left = "calc(50% - "+EL.offsetWidth/2+"px)"
    break
    case "Bottom right":
        EL.style.top = "calc(100% - "+EL.offsetHeight+"px)"
        EL.style.left = "calc(100% - "+EL.offsetWidth+"px)"
    break
}

parameters.name: Position
parameters.supplementaryInformation: ["Top left","Top center","Top right","Center left","Center center","Center right","Bottom left","Bottom center","Bottom right"]
